main event: A witness observed a soft glowing yellow object traveling rapidly in Birmingham, Alabama on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The object moved about 1,100 feet in 2 to 3 seconds,The object was seen through the windshield of a car,The light was described as being as bright as a car headlight, The object was about half the size of the full moon, The investigation concluded it may have been a meteor.
witness description: The witness reported that their car began misfiring and almost stalled when the object came close.
